hero.title: Slice Game - Master the Art of Precision
hero.subtitle: Experience the thrill of precise slicing in this addictive arcade game that challenges your timing and accuracy.

controls.title: Intuitive Controls
controls.description: Simple yet engaging gameplay mechanics that anyone can pick up and enjoy.

challenge.title: Progressive Challenge
challenge.description: Each level brings new challenges and obstacles to test your skills.

competition.title: Global Competition
competition.description: Compete with players worldwide and climb the leaderboard rankings.

questions.a: Simply click the 'Play Now' button and the game will load instantly in your browser.
Yes, the basic version is completely free. We also offer a Pro version with additional features.
